470:1: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocata-duṣkaraṃ bhagavan paramaduṣkaramebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairutsoḍhaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa|
470:2: kathaṃ bhagavan ebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ?
470:3: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-caturṣu mañjuśrīrdharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ|
470:5: iha mañjuśrīrbodhisattvena mahāsattvena ācāragocarapratiṣṭhitena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ|
470:6: kathaṃ ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattva ācāragocarapratiṣṭhito bhavati?
470:7: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānto bhavati,
470:9: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme carati,
470:14: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rājānaṃ saṃsevate,
470:15: na rājaputrān na rājamahāmātrān na rājapuruṣān saṃsevate na bhajate na paryupāste nopasaṃkrāmati,
470:18: na ca lokāyatamantradhārakān na lokāyatikān sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
470:19: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti|
470:20: na cāṇḍalān na mauṣṭikān na saukarikān na kaukkuṭikān na mṛgalubdhakān na māṃsikān na naṭanṛttakān na jhallān na mallān|
470:22: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti|
470:25: śrāvakayānīyāṃśca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā na sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
470:26: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti|
470:27: na ca taiḥ saha samavadhānagocaro bhavati caṃkrame vā vihāre vā|
470:28: anyatropasaṃkrāntānāṃ caiṣāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate,
470:31: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mātṛgrāmasya anyatarānyataramanunayanimittamudgṛhya abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
470:32: na ca mātṛgrāmasya abhīkṣṇaṃ darśanakāmo bhavati|
470:34: na ca dārikāṃ vā kanyāṃ vā vadhukāṃ vā abhīkṣṇamābhāṣitavyāṃ manyate,
470:37: na ca tena sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
470:39: na caikākī bhikṣārthamantargṛhaṃ praviśati anyatra tathāgatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayamānaḥ|
470:45: na ca śrāmaṇeraṃ na ca śrāmaṇerīṃ na bhikṣuṃ na bhikṣuṇīṃ na kumārakaṃ na kumārikāṃ sātīyati,
470:46: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
470:51: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān śūnyān vyavalokayati,
470:52: yathāvat pratiṣṭhitān dharmān aviparītasthāyino yathābhūtasthitānacalānakampyānavivartyānaparivartān sadā yathābhūtasthitānākāśasvabhāvānniruktivyavahāravivarjitānajātānabhutān anasaṃbhūtān asaṃskṛtān asaṃtānān asattābhilāpapravyāhṛtānasaṅgasthānasthitān saṃjñāviparyāsaprādurbhūtān|
470:53: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo'bhīkṣṇaṃ sarvadharmān vyavalokayan viharati anena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gocare sthito bhavati|
470:55: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
470:60: ye cāpiṃ rājapuruṣāḥ kuryāttehi na saṃstavam|
470:66: yā nirvṛtiṃ gaveṣanti dṛṣṭe dharme upāsikāḥ|
470:69: tasya bhāṣet sadā dhīro anolīno aniśritaḥ||7||
470:72: na tā saṃmodayejjātu kauśalyaṃ hāsa pṛcchitum|
470:78: vāramukhyā na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ|
470:80: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍitaḥ|
470:81: na caikaḥ praviśettatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhavet||13||
470:82: yadāpi praviśed grāmaṃ bhojanārthī punaḥ punaḥ|
470:83: dvitīyaṃ bhikṣu mārgeta buddhaṃ vā samanusmaret||14||
470:88: strīti nācarate dhīro puruṣeti na kalpayet|
470:90: ācāro hi ayaṃ ukto bodhisattvāna sarvaśaḥ|
470:120: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrirbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitukāmaḥ sukhasthito bhavati|
470:121: sa sukhasthitaśca dharmaṃ bhāṣate kāyagataṃ vā pustakagataṃ vā|
470:126: na cānyeṣāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ nāma gṛhītvā avarṇa bhāṣate,
470:131: sa āgatāgatānāṃ dhārmaśrāvaṇikānāmanuparigrāhikayā anabhyasūyayā dharmaṃ deśayati|
470:132: avivadamāno na ca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānena visarjayati|
470:135: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
470:178: na tasya duḥkhaṃ na ca antarāyo
470:188: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmakṣayāntakāle vartamāne idaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nīrṣuko bhavatyaśaṭho'māyāvī,
470:191: na cānyeṣāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ vā kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati-dūre yūyaṃ kulaputrā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
470:201: ye ca daśasu dikṣu loke bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
470:203: dharmaṃ ca deśayamāno'nūnamanadhikaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati samena dharmapremṇā,
470:204: na ca kasyacidantaśo dharmapremṇāpyadhikataramanugrahaṃ karoti imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ||
470:205: anena mañjuśrīstṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmaparikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ sukhasparśaṃ viharati,
470:211: pustakagataṃ ca kṛtvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti||
470:214: śāṭhyaṃ ca mānaṃ tatha kūṭanāṃ ca
470:238: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitukāmastena bhikṣuṇā gṛhasthapravrajitānāmantikād dūreṇa dūraṃ vihartavyam,
470:240: ye ca sattvā bodhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti,
470:244: ye tathāgatasyopāyakauśalyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ na śṛṇvanti na jānanti na budhyante na pṛcchanti na śraddadhanti nādhimucyante|
470:247: api tu khalu punarahametāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yo yasmin sthito bhaviṣyati,
470:248: taṃ tasminneva ṛddhibalenāvarjayiṣyāmi pattīyāpayiṣyāmi avatārayiṣyāmi paripācayiṣyāmi||
470:249: anenāpi mañjuśrīścaturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamāno'vyābādho bhavati,
470:250: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ rājñā rajaputrāṇāṃ rājāmātyānāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ naigamajānapadānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām|
470:251: antarīkṣāvacarāścāsya devatāḥ śrāddhāḥ pṛṣṭhato'nubaddhā bhaviṣyanti dharmaśravaṇāya|
470:252: devaputrāścāsya sadānubaddhā bhaviṣyantyārakṣāyai grāmagatasya vā vihāragatasya vā|
470:254: tasya ca vyākaraṇenaṃ tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti|
470:258: durlabho'sya mañjuśrīrdharmaparyāyasya bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu śabdo vā ghoṣo vā nāmaśravo vā||
470:259: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrī rājā bhavati balacakravartī,
470:261: tato'sya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratirājānastena sārdhaṃ vigrahamāpannā bhavanti|
470:262: atha tasya rājño balacakravartino vividhā yodhā bhavanti|
470:264: atha sa rājā tān yodhān yudhyamānān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ prīto bhavatyāttamanaskaḥ|
470:265: sa prīta āttamanāḥ samānasteṣāṃ yodhānāṃ vividhāni dānāni dadāti|
470:266: tadyathā grāmaṃ vā grāmakṣetrāṇi vā dadāti,
470:269: veṣṭanāni hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni karṇābharaṇāni sauvarṇasūtrāṇi hārārdhahārāṇi hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālānyapi dadāti,
470:274: eka eva hi sa cūḍāmaṇī rājño mūrdhasthāyī|
470:275: yadā punarmañjuśrī rājā tamapi cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti,
470:276: tadā sa sarvo rājñaścaturaṅgabalakāya āścaryaprāpto bhavatyadbhutaprāptaḥ|
470:277: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā svena bāhubalanirjitena puṇyabalanirjitena traidhātuke dharmeṇa dharmarājyaṃ kārayati|
470:279: atha khalu tathāgatasyāpi āryā yodhā māreṇa sārdhaṃ yudhyante|
470:280: atha khalu mañjuśrīstathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā teṣāmāryāṇāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā vividhāni sūtraśatasahasrāṇi bhāṣate sma catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣaṇārtham|
470:284: tatra mañjuśrīryathā sa rājā balacakravartī teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ mahatā puruṣakāreṇa vismāpitaḥ samānaḥ paścāttaṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ paścimaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti sarvalokāśraddheyaṃ vismayabhūtam|
470:285: yathā mañjuśrīstasya rājñaḥ sa cūḍāmaṇiścirarakṣito mūrdhasthāyī,
470:286: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastraidhātuke dharmarājo dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayamāṇo yasmin samaye paśyati śrāvakāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca skandhamāreṇa vā kleśamāreṇa vā sārdhaṃ yudhyamānān,
470:287: taiśca sārdhaṃ yudhyamānairyadā rāgadveṣamohakṣayaḥ sarvatraidhātukānniḥsaraṇaṃ sarvamāranirghātanaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraḥ kṛto bhavati,
470:288: tadā tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'pyārāgitaḥ samānasteṣāmāryāṇāṃ yodhānāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ sarvalokavipratyanīkaṃ sarvalokāśraddheyamabhāṣitapūrvamanirdiṣṭapūrvaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣate sma|
470:289: sarveṣāṃ sarvajñatāhārakaṃ mahācūḍāmaṇiprakhyaṃ tathāgataḥ śrāvakebhyo'nuprayacchati sma|
470:293: yo'yaṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatena adya tenaiva rājñā balacakravartinā ciraparirakṣitaścūḍāmaṇiravamucya yodhebhyo dattaḥ|
470:294: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato'pīmaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ cirānurakṣitaṃ sarvadharmaparyāyāṇāṃ mūrdhasthāyi tathāgatavijñeyam|
470:296: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
470:335: saṃrakṣitaṃ me na ca jātu proktaṃ
470:341: na tasya śoko na pi cāntarāyo
470:343: na ca cchavī kṛṣṇika tasya bhoti
470:349: na tasya śastraṃ na viṣaṃ kadācit
470:388: samādhi so labdhu jinaṃ ca paśyati||67||
